net_client_steamdatagram_enable_override.Name: Net Client Steam Datagram Enable Override

mm_csgo_community_search_players_min.Description: Sets minimum players for community search.
mm_csgo_community_search_players_min.Name: MM CS:GO Community Search Players Min

ui_setting_advertiseforhire_auto.Name: UI Setting Advertise for Hire Auto

cl_drawhud_force_radar.Description: 0 = default | 1 = draw radar even if hud disabled | -1 = force no radar
cl_drawhud_force_radar.Name: CL DrawHUD Force Radar

cl_radar_rotate.Description: Allow the radar to rotate or not.
cl_radar_rotate.Name: CL Radar Rotate

cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard.Description: If set to true, the radar will toggle to square when the scoreboard is visible.
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard.Name: CL Radar Square With Scoreboard

cl_crosshair_drawoutline.Description: Draws a black outline around the crosshair for better visibility
cl_crosshair_drawoutline.Name: CL Crosshair Drawoutline

cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio.Description: Determines length ratio of inner and outer crosshair pips in style 2.
cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio.Name: CL Crosshair Dynamic Maxdist Splitratio

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod.Description: Alpha modification for inner crosshair pips after split in style 2.
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod.Name: CL Crosshair Dynamic Splitalpha Innermod

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod.Description: Alpha modification for outer crosshair pips after split in style 2.
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod.Name: CL Crosshair Dynamic Splitalpha Outermod

cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist.Description: Distance for crosshair pips split in style 2.
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist.Name: CL Crosshair Dynamic Splitdist

cl_crosshair_friendly_warning.Description: Toggles crosshair warning for friendly targets.
cl_crosshair_friendly_warning.Name: CL Crosshair Friendly Warning

cl_crosshair_recoil.Description: Indicates whether crosshair accounts for recoil.
cl_crosshair_recoil.Name: CL Crosshair Recoil

cl_crosshair_sniper_show_normal_inaccura.Description: Include standing inaccuracy when determining sniper crosshair blur.
cl_crosshair_sniper_show_normal_inaccura.Name: CL Crosshair Sniper Show Normal Inaccuracy

cl_crosshair_sniper_width.Description: If >1, sniper scope cross lines gain extra width.
cl_crosshair_sniper_width.Name: CL Crosshair Sniper Width

cl_crosshairdot.Description: Enables a center dot in the crosshair.
cl_crosshairdot.Name: CL Crosshair Dot

cl_crosshairgap.Description: Sets the gap size in the crosshair.
cl_crosshairgap.Name: CL Crosshair Gap

cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue.Description: If set to 1, the gap will update dynamically based on the equipped weapon.
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue.Name: CL Crosshair Gap Useweaponvalue

cl_crosshairsize.Description: Sets the size of the crosshair.
cl_crosshairsize.Name: CL Crosshair Size

cl_crosshairstyle.Description: Sets the style of the crosshair.
cl_crosshairstyle.Name: CL Crosshair Style

cl_crosshairthickness.Description: Sets the thickness of the crosshair.
cl_crosshairthickness.Name: CL Crosshair Thickness

cl_observed_bot_crosshair.Description: Control the crosshair shown when observing a bot.
cl_observed_bot_crosshair.Name: CL Observed Bot Crosshair

cl_draw_only_deathnotices.Description: For drawing only the crosshair and death notices (used for moviemaking).
cl_draw_only_deathnotices.Name: CL Draw Only Deathnotices

cl_fixedcrosshairgap.Description: For crosshair style 1: Size of the gap between the pips.
cl_fixedcrosshairgap.Name: CL Fixed Crosshair Gap

cl_ping_fade_deadzone.Description: Distance from the crosshair over which the ping is completely invisible.
cl_ping_fade_deadzone.Name: CL Ping Fade Deadzone

cl_ping_fade_distance.Description: Distance from the crosshair over which the ping fades.
cl_ping_fade_distance.Name: CL Ping Fade Distance

cl_show_observer_crosshair.Description: Show the crosshair of the player being observed.
cl_show_observer_crosshair.Name: CL Show Observer Crosshair
